scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:auth"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../auth-service && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api-gateway && npm run lint:auth
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:check:frontend && npm run lint:check:api-gateway && npm run lint:check:auth
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:api-gateway && npm run lint:fix:auth
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:api-gateway && npm run format:auth
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:api-gateway && npm run type-check:auth
scripts.quality-check: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:api-gateway && npm run clean:auth
